about_the_game:
The Community Package provides Character Portrait and its gif, Emoji, Logo, like graphical assets for everyone. The Assets' copyright belongs to the imcGAMES but you could use this assets with only one condition, that this is only for non-commerical use. Try use it on your Blog, Video and more!

[Disclaimer]
The Graphical Assets' copyright belongs to the imcGAMES and this is non-commercial use only

.

name: Tree of Savior Community Media Kit 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 200 Series or later
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 or later
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860 or later

short_description: Tree of Savior's Graphical Assets for everyone, under non-commercial use. Try use images on your Blog or video or else!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai
